item.title: Service Interruption for Some Tenants
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Investigating Database Connectivity Issue

Summary: The company is currently investigating an issue with database connectivity that is impacting the ability to record recommendations into their cloud services for specific tenants. Service has been restored, and the situation is being monitored.

Nov 9, 17:01 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 9, 16:24 EST
Update - Service has been restored. We continue to monitor the situation.

Nov 9, 16:14 EST
Update - .

Nov 9, 14:25 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigation an issue with database connectivity that is impacting the ability to record recommendations into our cloud services. This issue only impacts specific tenants.

item.title: Service Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Nov 4, 10:44 EDT
Resolved - We determined the issue and were able to resolve a process that was intermittently impacting application capabilities.

Nov 4, 10:28 EDT
Investigating - StormForge has detected degradation with a service and is actively investigating. Customers may experience an issue with receiving recommendations for their containers during this time.

item.title: Application Services intermittently unavailable.
item.content:encoded:
Oct 11, 11:00 EDT
Resolved - StormForge Application Services were intermittently unavailable from 11:00 EST to approximately 15:00 EST.
